MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY14 postcode area of Cupar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am to repair a fault on underground cable on Hill Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:38am on the 8th of January 2021.
